about_the_game:
Isometric 2 Book

This Isometric 2 themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! The second book of it's kind offers various images and scenes all designed in the isometric perspective!

Isometric is back by popular demand!

Contents

The Isometric 2 book unlocks the following images:

  • Blocks - 45x45
  • Boombox - 77x71
  • Sushi - 85x65
  • Beach - 88x52
  • Treasure - 96x102
  • Isometric Pattern - 98x121
  • Earth - 100x110
  • House - 103x106
  • Thatched - 110x72
  • Urban - 126x92
  • Woods Cabin - 127x78
  • Beehive - 130x100
  • Dog House - 140x123
  • City - 158x148
  • Tower - 165x230
  • Modern Living - 184x133
  • Oasis - 200x130
  • Truck - 236x176
  • Interior - 237x220
  • Fuel - 265x165

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Isometric 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
